entry.question: Which Enterprise features are currently available?
entry.answer:
Enterprise features available:

  • Database cluster
  • Amazon SNS

entry.question: When should I use Amazon <acronym title="Simple Notification Service">SNS</acronym>?
entry.answer: It should be used when you use load balancing with multiple servers. Using Amazon <acronym title="Simple Notification Service">SNS</acronym> will make sure that the W3 Total Cache caches for each server is purged when required.

entry.question: How do I enable Database Cluster support?
entry.answer:
In order to use Database Cluster you need use WordPress in network mode and enable Enterprise mode for W3 Total Cache.

After enabling Enterprise mode you will find a area inside Database Cache box on the General Settings page. Click 'Enable database cluster' to enable the functionality.

entry.question: How do I configure Amazon <acronym title="Simple Notification Service">SNS</acronym>?
entry.answer:
1. You need to visit SNS and sign in /create account.
  2. Create a new topic.
  3. Copy paste the Topic ARN into correspongding field on the General Settings page.
  4. Enter the corrent SNS region in the corresponding textfield on General Settings page.
  5. Enter your API key and API secret. You find your API key and API secret under Security Credentials in your Amazon account.
  6. Click subscribe.
  7. Save settings

entry.question: What is required to use Amazon <acronym title="Simple Notification Service">SNS</acronym>?
entry.answer: You need to sign up for a Amazon Web Services account.
